snippet: Eugene Manu has struggled with sickle cell anemia and homelessness, but he has managed to stay in college and hopes to become a doctor someday.
abstract: Catholic Charities Archdiocese of New York, one of seven agencies supported by The New York Times Neediest Cases Fund, helps Eugene Manu of Harlem buy tablet computer to aid in his pursuit of college degree.
lead_paragraph: Eugene Manu has struggled with sickle cell anemia and homelessness, but he has managed to stay in college and hopes to become a doctor someday.

headline.print_headline: Keeping Faith, Even When Home Is an Uncertain Place
headline.main: Keeping Faith, Even When Home Is an Uncertain Place
